page.title: 04MARYC.BIOGRAPHY FORTESCUE
page.content: James Irvine Fortescue is a descendant of Henry Irvine who first placed a house on Kingcausie in the 16th C although the family are said to have come to Britain at the time of the Norman Conquest.The present Mr.Fortescue was born in 1917 and he spent much time travelling abroad as a child.He graduated at Aberdeen University in Honours French'German before the age of 20.He then travelled in the Middle East,"living rough."This prepared him for an exciting 4 years war service in India.Back home he became a Chartered Accountant.He has a fine record of public service.Estate business occupies his time now.Family history,into which he has put much research is an absorbing hobby.He is married and has 4 children.
